sentences.en: Despite the crudity of their methods and equipment, the experiment was a considerable success.
sentences.cn: 尽管他们的方法和设备较为粗陋，那次实验却相当成功。

sentences.en: Fractured zone has a crudity surface with a pitch.
sentences.cn: 断裂带表面粗糙,并带有斜度.

sentences.en: He had not expected such crudity from so sophisticated a minister.
sentences.cn: 他真没想到如此见多识广的部长竟会这么幼稚。

sentences.en: I'd never met such crudity before.
sentences.cn: 我从未见过这样粗鲁的行径.

sentences.en: She has revealed the truth of the common marriage: helplessness and endurance, crudity and warmth.
sentences.cn: 她写出了普通人婚姻的真谛: 无奈与忍耐, 粗糙中温情洋溢.
